Articles.Content:
So Hypo is pretty much done for now. Now to move on to Mobe since that seems like the second easiest.

http://i.imgur.com/dAyxpfN.png

It's so beautiful
Wwwwowww
Wow! I'd love to have this when it's out fully!
Looks awesome!
Nice!
Hi there! (I think mimas is a death star too ) When are you going to do download? cuse im so hyped for titan!
Can you make Hypo bouncy like a big sponge?
I really like the way the planet looks. The color changing from blue (teal?) and yellow in the different hemispheres makes it, y'know, not Saturn, but it keeps the prettiness of Saturn! I love it!
I will probably add hypo into all of my different games.

Hey all, sorry for being quiet for a while. I've been pretty busy with school and well, Battlefront beta. Today I attempted to make a procedural Ensol so here's a pic. I have had no luck with making textures for Tel and Ensol so they will be procedurally generated.
Still experimenting with PQS mods. Trying to get a decent looking Ensol using just PQS mods...

My suggestion is to have less craters, and more noise. The first image looks much better in my opinion.

Also, what monitor are you playing on that you need your screenshots to be so square-shaped?

My suggestion is to have less craters, and more noise. The first image looks much better in my opinion.

Also, what monitor are you playing on that you need your screenshots to be so square-shaped?

Gotcha, this is still just experimenting with stuff so thanks for the feedback! I use a 1280x1024 monitor.
This is beautiful! I'm looking forward to this. Hypo will be lots of fun for hopper landers.

I'm streaming development of this at http://www.twitch.tv/tygoo7

EDIT: Stream's over.

Edited October 18, 2015 by tygoo7

Looking at the Ensol screen shot at the top of the page and looks good. One suggestion would be to vary the size of the craters more - the round deep craters seem to be similar in size. Maybe size to a power law so there would be a few large craters and the smaller they got the greater the number. Dim recollection of hearing the real moons craters were that way but don't remember what the exponent was. Anyway good work!
Ensol Looks good to me! still HYPED for real release
Here's Tel.

So progress on Ensol is going pretty good, here's a quick recap on the current system.

It looks great so far, but with ensol i liked the original texture the most, I know you want to make it procedurally generated but i liked its likeness to the real planet, with all the stripes and such

It looks great so far, but with ensol i liked the original texture the most, I know you want to make it procedurally generated but i liked its likeness to the real planet, with all the stripes and such
